name: Penobscot River Kilometer Calculator
short_description:
Allows user to input UTM coordinates within the Penobscot River to calculate in-river distance (in kilometers) from the river's mouth to the location of interest. For the purposes of this calculator, river kilometer 0 is located at 516414E 4927755N in UTM Zone 19N, near the southwest corner of Verona Island.

Use of the console requires the installation of Python 3.3.5. 

To use this tool, simply install Python 3.3.5, download the RKM_console.py file, and run it. 

Please contact me with suggestions to improve this program.
summary: Lookup in river distances in the Penobscot from a simple console.
